item.title: Creative Video Editor for Ecommerce Ads (UGC, VSL, TikTok Ads) - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a talented Video Editor to create VSL and other style of ads for Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok for our ecommerce beauty brand. This long-term role is perfect for someone skilled in video editing.

What We Need:

- Independence: Work with minimal supervision.
- Efficiency: Quick project turnaround.
- Reliability: Strong work ethic.
- Creativity: Generate engaging ideas.
- Experience: VSLs (2-10 mins) and UGC ads (TikTok style).

Job Responsibilities:

- Follow Guidelines: Use scripts on Notion to align with our brand's vision.
- Utilize Materials: Work with product demos, influencer content, etc.
- Source Footage: Find and use footage from YouTube, blogs, etc.
- Creative Production: Produce main videos and variants, trying different hooks and styles.

Workload:

- Create 10-20 unique videos per week in various formats.

What We Provide:

- Content: Access to a variety of video materials.
- Brief: Detailed project guidelines and scripts on Notion.
- Feedback: Continuous feedback to help you grow.

Example Ads to be created attached

We’re excited to see your video editing and storytelling skills in action. Send your portfolio and apply now!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 14:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Marketing
Country: Italy
click to apply

item.title: Descript Expert with Video Editing Skills - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a Descript expert with video editing skills to edit 10-minute student testimonial videos for our program into 2-3 minute videos. The ideal candidate should know how to select the most impactful statements that resonate with viewers.

Responsibilities:

Edit student testimonial videos using Descript.
Identify and highlight the most impactful statements.
Deliver polished and professional videos.

Requirements:

Expertise in Descript.
Basic video editing skills.
Understanding of engaging and impactful content.

How to Apply:

Provide examples of previous work, especially with Descript.
Briefly explain your editing process.

item.title: Slides / animations for conference screen - Upwork
item.description:
We have a conference on 5-6 July in London. See 5 July in the Agenda section here https://indiaweek.uk/ and the Agenda section here https://indiaweek.uk/film for the session backgrounds we need to create. This is how the screen looked last year: https://www.economicpolicygroup.com/india-week-ideas-for-india-2023/.

Screen size/style. 11.5M By 3M, 2944 x 768pixel.

Based on brand assets provided, I need:

5 July:
- An intro animation using the animation you can see at the top of the website link above + sponsor logos' animation
- For each of the sessions, one background which has Session Title and maybe Speaker Names (not sure yet). About 6-7 of these

6 July:
- Same intro animation as the day before, but with different sponsor logos' animation
- Same session background slide requirement, about 5-6 sessions
- For the evening, we have a dinner where we need intro animation + sponsor logos animation, plus a few slides with names of speakers on the stage

We can use similar branding on the background for each session, but maybe slightly different or different colour between 5th day, 5th day, 5th evening.

The brand collateral, content on each of the slides etc I have avialable and it should be extremely straightforward. The only complex thing  might be 1-2 logos might be low quality, but we can cross that bridge if we get to it.

Last year, with someone similar to you in terms of experience and pricing, I paid $500, but I think that was an overestimate (so I was a little unhappy), because he finished it very quickly. The only thing that took time is the rendering.

I would need it delivered by Tuesday evening if possible. I will quickly review it then and sign off - last year we needed only one iteration because of some spelling mistakes, but the graphics were perfectly fine.


Posted On: June 27, 2024 13:56 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Logo Animation, DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Color Grading, Animation, Motion Design, Explainer Video, Videography, Video Production, 3D Modeling, 3D Design, Visual Effects
Skills: Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Logo Animation, DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Color Grading, Animation, Motion Design, Explainer Video, Videography, Video Production, 3D Modeling, 3D Design, Visual Effects
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Graphic Designer & Video Editor (PupRing) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative Graphic Designer & Video Editor to join our dynamic team. This is an excellent opportunity for someone with a keen eye for design and a knack for storytelling through various media formats. The ideal candidate will thrive in a fast-paced environment and be eager to drive our brand’s visual presence forward.

We are a dog-related business called PupRing! Our primary mission is to bring people closer to their dogs and celebrate the bond between themselves and their pets!

We are hiring 1 full-time editor with the opportunity to join our compassionate team. We offer flexible working hours, various opportunities for growth, and a nurturing environment of like-minded individuals!

We estimate this job will take 30 hours/week. With that in mind, we are allocating a budget of 700/month.

Responsibilities:

➤ Design and produce compelling graphics and video content for digital marketing campaigns, social media platforms, and our website.
➤ Collaborate closely with the marketing and product teams to brainstorm and conceptualize innovative design solutions.
➤ Manage multiple projects from concept through completion under tight deadlines.
➤ Adapt designs based on feedback and data insights to optimize performance.

Qualifications:

➤ Proven experience in graphic design and video editing with a strong portfolio showcasing diverse projects.
➤ Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, including Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, and After Effects.
➤ Excellent communication skills and meticulous attention to detail.
➤ A proactive and enthusiastic approach to learning new skills and technologies.

For this interview: Create a single static graphic advertisement for PupRing that effectively captures the essence of our brand and appeals to pet owners. Use the competitors' ads for inspiration. The quality of your work will determine if you are moved to the next round. Additionally, include a Facebook ad caption (150 characters max) that complements your advertisement.

Inspiration Sources:

➤ PupRing's Ad Library: https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?active_status=all&ad_type=all&country=US&view_all_page_id=102064214781550&sort_data[direction]=desc&sort_data[mode]=relevancy_monthly_grouped&search_type=page&media_type=all
➤ Competitor 1: https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?active_status=all&ad_type=all&country=US&view_all_page_id=283118348550488&sort_data[direction]=desc&sort_data[mode]=relevancy_monthly_grouped&search_type=page&media_type=all
➤ Competitor 2: https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?active_status=all&ad_type=all&country=US&view_all_page_id=324181618236516&sort_data[direction]=desc&sort_data[mode]=relevancy_monthly_grouped&search_type=page&media_type=all

Submission Guidelines:

➤ Submit your graphic as a high-resolution JPEG or PNG file in the messages section on upwork
➤ Include your ad caption below your submitted work in the messages section

Budget: $700
Posted On: June 27, 2024 13:54 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Adobe InDesign, Social Media Imagery, Graphic Design
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Adobe InDesign, Social Media Imagery, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Creative Agency Looking For Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
OVERVIEW:

We are a boutique performance marketing agency that works with 7, 8 and 9-figure eCommerce brands. We specialise in end-to-end performance ad creative development.

We are looking to hire a new video editor to join our team.

We are looking to hire someone full-time but are looking to hire the best of the best in terms of work quality, communication, meeting deadlines, etc..

That's why there will first be a 1-month trial on a part-time basis, in this month trial we will evaluate your skills and then see if we can bring you on board full-time.

REQUIREMENTS:

To apply must be:

- You should be comfortable working in EST hours
- You should be a well rounded editor (that has experience producing UGC and VSLs primarily)
- You must be proactive and have initiative, we're not looking for a robot that is just taking commands
- You must be looking for a full-time position and the opportunity to grow with a team long-term
- We are a small team that is growing fast, so you must be able to adapt quickly to new changes and adapt to a new working environment

COMPENSATION:

The trial period will be 1 month and you will be paid 60USD per task. You can expect 5-10 tasks to be assigned to you.

After the trial month we will evaluate if you could work with us on a full-time basis, which is our ultimate goal.

The compensation for the full-time position will be a 1200USD flat retainer to start with with the potential to grow in the future

NEXT STEPS:

If you're interested, apply for this position and we will ask you to share your portfolio and complete a small task to test your skills.

If everything goes well and we like your work, you'll be asked to have a 1on1 interview with us and see if you would be a good addition to our team.

If everything goes well in the interview, we will begin with the trial period.

Budget: $1,200
Posted On: June 27, 2024 13:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Country: Italy
click to apply

item.title: hiring for TikTok SlideShow Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Full job description
Permanent – Full time – Part Time - Salary: Pay Performance $3-$10 a hour

We base our payments on a pay performance basis.

Equipment and regulations

Equipment you will be delivered

Phone , phone case, screen protector also charger cable

What we expect with our regulations

After we’ve sent the equipment and everything is prepped. There will be a fair  time period set for yourself to complete the task.

We expect you to deliver all equipment back.

All cost will be covered by us.

Full job description

CLEAR REQUIREMENTS YOU WILL BE DEALING WITH EXPLICIT CONTENT WHICH COULD BE AGAINST YOUR COUNTRY LAW(PLEASE MAKE SURE TO CHECK)

The job would include posting to tiktok. Through a slideshow process. You will be dealt with photos and trends to follow. Once you have been sent the trend you’ll be asked to do them with the phone we equipped. Once the time period is up we expect you finished the trend report and you will be payed in full.

Skills and requirements we expect

Whatsapp  communications

A good level of english spoken

item.title: UGC videos for product video ads (girls) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a UGC content creator to produce high-quality video ads (each of under 60 seconds) for 4 products in the skin care and wellness industry. Products like face serum, face mask, breast oil, Weight gainer, libido booster,  bum and back cream. As a content creator, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, editing, and delivering engaging video content that highlights the benefits and features of our products. This role requires a strong understanding of UGC trends and the ability to create content that resonates with our target audience.

    Key skills:
    - Video production
    - Video editing
    - Storyboarding
    - Content ideation
    - Creative direction
    - Knowledge of skin care and wellness industry

    Time frame: Under 60 Second


Budget: $50

item.title: Youtube Editor Niche How it is made products - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced YouTube Video Editor to join our team. The ideal candidate has extensive experience editing YouTube videos and is familiar with our niche market: the process of production methods and how products are made. You will be responsible for creating engaging and informative videos that inform and inspire our viewers.

Responsibilities:

• Editing videos for our YouTube channel
• Adding visual effects, music, sound effects and other elements to make videos attractive and professional.
• Ensuring the consistency and quality of all video
• Working with our team to understand and improve the content and script of the videos.
• Following the latest trends and techniques in video editing and YouTube marketing to keep our videos relevant and up to date.

Requirements:

• At least 3 years of experience editing YouTube videos.
• Experience with our niche market and a good understanding of production methods.
• Creative and an eye for detail,
• Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a rapidly changing environment.

Budget: $70
Posted On: June 27, 2024 13:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Netherlands

item.title: Video Editor Wanted To Create 20 Videos - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a video editor to help me create short, heartwarming videos (20 seconds each) alongside my voiceovers. Examples will be given.

I'll provide the voiceover/script for each video; your task will be to source engaging video clips (3-5 clips per video) and edit the video clips to match the voiceover.

4 Videos per week will be required to start with.

To summarise:
- I'll provide the script, voiceover, and any specific instructions.
- You find the clips, edit them, and make it all look amazing.

Please send me a message if this interests you and we can discuss further.

Thanks

item.title: Create IG reels for our publication - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

Auster WIP is a publication at the intersection of tech, culture, and creativity, exploring the new frontiers of self-discovery in the digital era. Our initiatives include interviewing artists, sharing AI explainers, showcasing the latest creative tools, profiling leading content creators, and offering tips, tools, and news relevant to our audience.

We are looking for a creative who is a PRO at creating IG reels.

References:

On design inspirations:
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8t85a1CFb0/

On resources for creatives:
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C58ggJsiJTE/

On Graphic Design Trends:
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8KCKjlPuuU/

you should be :
- an expert at creating video reels ideally having experience in after effects.
- A natural storyteller who can storyboard concepts quickly
- Know the IG algorithm and how ti make content go viral
- A pro at selecting the right audio for the reels
- A graphic designer or a creative with a lot of knowledge on the latest trends
- Research and detail oriented


Hourly Range: $18.00-$32.00

item.ns0:encoded:
Hello,

Auster WIP is a publication at the intersection of tech, culture, and creativity, exploring the new frontiers of self-discovery in the digital era. Our initiatives include interviewing artists, sharing AI explainers, showcasing the latest creative tools, profiling leading content creators, and offering tips, tools, and news relevant to our audience.

We are looking for a creative who is a PRO at creating IG reels.

References:

On design inspirations:
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8t85a1CFb0/

On resources for creatives:
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C58ggJsiJTE/

On Graphic Design Trends:
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8KCKjlPuuU/

you should be :
- an expert at creating video reels ideally having experience in after effects.
- A natural storyteller who can storyboard concepts quickly
- Know the IG algorithm and how ti make content go viral
- A pro at selecting the right audio for the reels
- A graphic designer or a creative with a lot of knowledge on the latest trends
- Research and detail oriented


Hourly Range: $18.00-$32.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 13:33 UTC
Category: Social Media Strategy
Skills:Content Creation, Social Media Imagery, Instagram, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Instagram Reels
Skills: Content Creation, Social Media Imagery, Instagram, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Instagram Reels

item.title: TikTok Content Creator for Costume Store - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled TikTok Content Creator to produce engaging and creative content for our costume store. As a content creator, you will be responsible for brainstorming, planning, and executing TikTok videos that showcase our costume products in a fun and exciting way. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of TikTok trends, viral content, and be able to create visually appealing videos that resonate with our target audience.

    Responsibilities:
    - Brainstorm and develop creative TikTok video ideas
    - Film and edit engaging TikTok videos that highlight our costumes
    - Stay up-to-date with TikTok trends and utilize them in content creation
    - Collaborate with our marketing team to align content with brand guidelines
    - Monitor and respond to comments and engagement on TikTok

    Requirements:
    - Proven experience as a TikTok content creator
    - Knowledge of TikTok trends, features, and best practices
    - Strong video editing skills and proficiency in editing software
    - Excellent communication and collaboration skills

    If you have a passion for creating captivating content and have a solid understanding of the TikTok platform, we would love to hear from you. This is a great opportunity to showcase your creativity and expand your portfolio in the digital marketing space.


Posted On: June 27, 2024 13:33 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Instagram
Skills: TikTok, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Instagram
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Full Time Video Editor (On-Site) - Upwork
item.description:
Location: I8 Markaz, Islamabad

About Us:
At Kodestra, we specialize in transforming user experiences through cutting-edge tech solutions across IT, cybersecurity, cloud, and UI/UX.

Role:
Seeking a creative Video Editor to join our collaborative team. If you thrive on editing reels, vlogs, podcasts, and more, we want to hear from you!

Responsibilities:

-Edit various types of videos with precision and creativity.
-Collaborate closely with our creative and marketing teams.
-Stay updated with the latest video editing trends.

Requirements:

-Mid to senior-level experience (senior preferred).
-Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects (preferred), and CapCut.
-Strong portfolio showcasing your skills.
-Creative, detail-oriented, and excellent time management.

Perks:
-Professional development opportunities.
-Work with top talent in a fun and collaborative environment.
-Competitive salary package.

Budget: $350

item.title: Need Help With Video Sound Quality [Pilates] - Upwork
item.description:
I have a number of videos that I have recorded on both a Sony RX-100 and an Iphone 14 Pro Max with a Rode Wireless Go Mic that I need help making the audio quality sound better. Using the limited options in the Studio Sound and Capcut, I cannot make these sound good enough. They need to go live for my new portal I am launching on Monday. I am looking for someone to help me make these 8 sound better before the launch.

The videos:
Pilates Class 1: 15 minutes
Pilates Class 2: 25 minutes
Pilates Class 3: 30 minutes
Pilates Class 4: 25 Minutes
Pilates Class 5: 20 Minutes

Shaking Class 5 Minutes
Shaking Class 5 Minutes
Shaking Class 5 Minutes

Once these are finished, I have another 20 videos to optimize the sound quality on but they are not as urgent as these ones.

Thanks,
Louise

item.title: Shortform Video Editor for Tiktok/IG/YT Shorts (LONG TERM POTENTIAL) - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a Video Editor with Intermediate Skill for a Potential Full Time Position in our company. He/she will be tasked for making 2-3 Shortform Videos on a daily basis.

The type of video that we're looking for are similar to these:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1KkFjs7bZayQfKygivv8quT--gMETsper?usp=sharing

Job Requirements:
1. Has experience on a Video Editing Job before
2. Has mastered Adobe Premiere Pro
3. Willing to work 8-12 hours a day from Monday-Friday (9am-5pm UK time)
4. Able to work under pressure
5. Good communication skill and has a Good Personality
6. 1-3 hours turnaround per video
7. Able to speak English fluently
8. Has a clear webcam and microphone

This job could be a way for you to get a Full Time Job in the future, we will be consistently monitoring your performance throughout the Probation Period.

For those who interested in this role, please provide us with a sample video from your past work in the attachment box down below.

Type GREEN on the first sentence of your proposal so we know that you've read the whole thing, we won't reply otherwise.

Budget: $15

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Creative Cloud, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: Adobe Creative Cloud, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics

item.title: High-Level Video Editor, Content Creator, Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and motivated Expert - Level Video Editor / Content Creator that is experienced in using AI Technology/Software to join our team on a freelance basis. We specialize in delivering captivating and high-quality video content for our client's social media platforms, including Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube shorts.

The Video Editor will be responsible for assembling recorded raw footage into a visually appealing, cohesive final product.

Qualifications:

✔️ Proven experience as a Video Editor/Content Creator, with a strong portfolio showcasing your editing skills and ability to create viral content.

✔️ Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.

✔️Deep understanding of social media platforms and their respective content formats, particularly Instagram and TikTok.

✔️ Excellent storytelling and communication skills, with the ability to convey complex ideas through compelling visual narratives.

✔️ Strong attention to detail and a passion for staying ahead of trends in digital media and pop culture.

✔️ Must be creative, deadline-oriented, and organized.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 13:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro, Video Transition, Social Video Enhancement, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Marketing, Explainer Video
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro, Video Transition, Social Video Enhancement, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Marketing, Explainer Video

item.title: Seeking Video Editor for Commercial Style Video to Promote Early Voting - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking Video Editor for Commercial Style Video to Promote Early Voting

Job Description:

I am looking for a skilled video editor to complete a commercial-style video aimed at promoting early voting. The project involves editing speaker video footage, integrating audio tracks, and utilizing B-roll with informational text that needs to be displayed on the screen.

Responsibilities:

• Edit and assemble raw footage into a polished, engaging commercial.
•
• Integrate B-roll footage seamlessly.
• Add and display text information on screen in a visually appealing manner.
• Ensure the final video aligns with the overall message and branding of the campaign.

Requirements:

• Proven experience in video editing, preferably for commercial or promotional content.
• Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
• Strong sense of timing, pacing, and a keen eye for detail.
• Ability to work with provided materials and enhance them creatively.
• Excellent communication skills and the ability to work with feedback.

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1CogtzEOfT-zN8nkGolwICqkjGSJxt6Bc?usp=sharing

If you are interested and have the necessary skills and experience, please send your portfolio or examples of your previous work, along with a brief description of your approach to this project, to
Thank you for your interest, and I look forward to seeing your work!


Posted On: June 27, 2024 13:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro, Corporate Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro, Corporate Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
